Articles.Content:
My launcher looks like this.

I've owned KSP since 2013 and it's been like this for a long while over all versions I've played. The game works fine but the update feature doesn't work just like the picture illustrates. 

Any idea on how to fix this?

@Lotsaskink Welcome to the forums!

The launcher has not been supported officially by SQUAD for a long time...I'd recommend you download updates from the KSP Store/Steam and launch from the .exe in the KSP root folder.

Thanks.

It's weird why it would still be in the games files but that's jut how it is I guess.
